name: Planter Box
description:
Made for the Brackey's Game Jam #2: Love is Blind

VR gardening toy, tend to your own little garden. 

Two modes:

Simple single player or asymetric local coop: VR player is blind, non VR player helps them tend the garden. 

Inspired by my grandfather who, even with sever macular degeneration continued to run his little nursery right up until the last few month before he passed.
